display.title: Imbuing with Potential
display.description: Using any Seasonal Essence you can enchance an item with an [Empty Slot] allowing it to gain a special runic enchantment, simply throw the two items into a Sculk Forge [Required: 1x Essence of Life/Scorch/Ash/Frost/Ender 1x Any Item | Drop Craft With: Sculk Forge]
